40506012.review:
TL:DR Very fun and simple game has it's own intricacies to make it unique

This game is one of the best early access titles I have had the pleasure to take part in. Below is a list of pro's and con's on my opinion of the game so far.

Pro's
1: Sound track is cool and fits perfectly with the space environment
2: Game is uniqe yet simple at the same time
3: Game is for both very casual or very hardcore players. (Do not try to play the game on the highest difficulty. You will Definitely need to learn your preferred character and upgrade them a bit)
4: All the ore you mine is shared, so noone calling out and hogging all the gold/upgrade materials for themselves
5: All the characters are all good their own way and cover all sorts of playstyles. Including the fact that there is no fighting over a class, you can all be the same thing if you want yet that is ill advised.

Con's
1: Game is lacking in content but still has quite a bit in it with developers that seem to really enjoy the community working together on what to do.
2: Game can randomly DC you which sucks since you will usually get to know people in the lobby and think "Oh hey this'll be a fun game these guys seems pretty nice" and then in an instant be out of the game with not even a goodbye.
3: Mic can randomly be stuck on all talk instead of push to talk with no known way to fix it, which can be embarassing 
4: Game has a few odd animations like reloading the gunner's revolver that you can really only notice if you look real closely.
5: Some people can start under the drill when you spawn in the game which is only minor becuase you will always be able to get out from under it right as it takes back off.

这是一个非常有趣的游戏 ，我之前没玩过类似的游戏，总结一下主要玩法就是四个人配合挖矿【四个人物包括钻机，机枪，侦查，工程师】，并抵御虫子的攻击，现在只有一个探矿考察得任务模式，就是完成挖矿目标 ，然后撤离。生态环境较为明显，但是每一个生态环境都是一样的虫子，这点需要改进。    
游玩过程不多说，和朋友一起开黑会更好，因为如果没人说话的话会比较无聊，探矿过程 一般最多三十分钟这是因为我只玩了前两个难度，后面的等熟练了再去尝试。
        在这里和各位分享一个有趣的东西，不知道各位有没有把你的基地探索一遍呢，在基地第二层你可以找到一个纪念堂可以看见一个巨大的矮人塑像，基地中很多东西还没有添加，现在毕竟只是A测等以后或许会加入更多有趣的模式玩法和细节当然各种虫子也是会变多吧~

Wow. And this is early access? Great job so far. My team and I are really looking forward to further updates to this game. The classes could use a little tweaking, and I would like to see more customizations (in both the vanity collections and in the upgrades for your loadouts. Overall, a lot of fun if youve got a team.

Minor bugs, like drop pod landing with the door facing a wall. Or the MULE walking through walls to get to the escape pod, making you fend for yourself to escape.

40504577.review:
"No dwarf left behind!" *All three of you are in the escape pod and the last guy is downed 150m away.* >.>

In all seriousness, this is a very unique experience. It's visually stunning with low-end graphics and gives a very chill vibe as you go spelunking for precious materials. I enjoy the classes. Each class has very useful abilities that never go to waste. The game might seem benign, but will punish you unexpectedly. If you've ever played Unloved, I'd compare the objective to that, (decend into dangerous area, find something important while searching and fighting your way through waves of enemies and obstacles, and make your way back to the escape pod) but this is cascades better. The soundtrack has a retro 80's synth feel, like Stranger Things. Very nice. There's room for improvement, but I'm positive the devs know what they're doing. If you have friends that enjoy coop, get it.

40504176.review:
I love this game.  Going on mining expeditions with my friends has been one of the most fun things I've done in a while.  The tense, action-packed, and even the frustrating and hilarious moments during each mission have made every single play session worth it.. we've had stories to tell to the people who couldn't be there, and funny references to old missions to bring up and laugh about.

For those of you who don't have online friends who would play this, you can always jump in with some random people on servers, and there's even a built-in voice chat function for communicating with those people.  Even if you don't have a headset, you can use the pointer tool for some basic communication.. so really, just play this game in multiplayer if possible, I don't think it'd be as fun solo, even though that's an option.

Just when we were thinking that the game might have a little too much repetitiveness, we found out that there are more game modes.. in addition to mining and egg-collection missions that are availible early on, you'll eventually be able to get access to hunting and point extraction missions, which play fairly differently.  The enemy variety COULD be a little better, but it's fine as-is.. and maybe more enemies will be added during the Early Access period anyway, we'll just have to see.

The 4 distinct classes work well together in almost any configuration.  Though it's probably best to have a mix of different classes in a team, it's perfectly playable if everyone wants to play the same class, really.  More engineers means more turrets and placable platforms.. more gunners means more ziplines and more firepower.. The sky is the limit, and you'll find yourself having a unique type of fun and challenges with any configuration.

I love playing Gunner, because I love ziplining around the levels.. especially during escape sequences, when seconds matter toward getting back to the dropship in time, and large gaps may need to be crossed, however, I can't tell you how many times we've had our butts saved by my friend playing Driller who simply tunnelled us to victory.  We like to laugh at our Scout, who tends to die a lot from fall damage, but is good at finding where we need to go next.. and our Engineer, whose turrets have gotten us out of plenty of sticky, hectic enemy swarms.

The feeling of cooperation in this game is hard to match... and like I said before, you'll certainly have some awesome stories you'll be able to tell from your expeditions down into this games varied types of cave systems and mission types will.

This is Early Access done correctly.  The game is already fun, already stable, already great.. and it can only get better from here on.  I look forward to seeing what the updates bring.  If you're thinking about this, Definitely get it!

40503859.review:
有趣有趣有趣!!!!!!!
  4个不同职业的矮人,到一个被虫子占领的星球上采集特殊的矿物.4个人分工合作,探索,挖矿,杀虫子.
  破坏系统类似MC,你可以挖地道.你可以挖堑壕,你也可以挖近道直接接近队友.或者开路直达目的地.矮人们还有类似吊索和凝胶地板的改变地形的技能来方便队伍移动.
  任务中确实地形是随机生成的,但架不住玩家破坏.曾经就匹配到一个钻矿手疯狂开路,弄的路只会他走,别人都得跟着他才能找到路.
  怪物系统种类还算不错,但是目前看来,低难度区域太过简单,而高难度区域仅仅是堆血量和数量.不过毕竟测试版本,以现在的样子和完成度,可以展望游戏的未来前景相当不错.
  联机系统目前看来还算稳定,主要有中文,有国服,有内置语音的缘故.国服玩家非常多,话多的也非常多...只出现过和台湾同胞联机丢包,和美服玩家联机断麦等小事故.国内联机基本稳定.
  目前看来缺点在于内容拓展度还不够.但看了大厅里高达三层的建筑四通八达,小房间众多.相信开发商还有很多内容还在案上.
  总之,适合联机,游戏内容有趣,未来值得期待.推荐购买.

40503811.review: For 25$ this game is worth the money in my opinion. The developers took the very popular Left 4 Dead fight hordes of enemies formula and gave it more kick. It has great grahics/optimization, a good progression system, and includes 4 different classes that each play differently and are equiped with a diverse set of tools/weapons. It also has amazing and immersive ecosystems with diverse alien organisms, some harmless some not so. Now remember this is a 4 player co-op game and is best played with a group of friends and can impact your experience if played solo. You can still have fun if you join a group of randoms and can communicate with them in game. It is in early access and just released so the developers say that there will be much more content added in the future(read the early access summary). This game has such potential and I feel that if the developers stay true to their word and keep adding more and more content it can be even better.

40503201.review:
So far, I'm really enjoying this game. 

The cycling missions in various biomes lets most missions feel different enough, and with the different level lengths and maze complexity, it makes each mission feel interesting.

I have some issues with the enemies and current upgrades, but I am confident that future updates will solve these issues.
Right now, there are a very limited number of enemies, with a few special spawns based on the biome. However, 90% of the combat will be against the same couple bugs. 

There are some issues with hitboxes and enemies clipping through the ground and walls, but i expect that to be addressed eventually

I also don't really like the current upgrade system, with most upgrades not feeling rewarding enough for the materials you have to spend to unlock them. Hopefully, there will be more upgrade options, or more item options in the future. I would like to see upgrades for carrying capacity for minerals, the pickaxe, and ammo counts for more items.

Solid 8/10 for an early access game, and with friends it's a lot of fun. Mostly to laugh as you fly away in the escape pod, leaving them to die a horrible death

40503026.review:
If you feel the game is too easy, you aren't playing on a high enough difficulty....

Me and a group of randos were playing on the 2nd highest difficulty. I believe it is Hazerdous-3? (Hazerdous-4 being the highest) and we were managing. We were completeing all mission types on H3. We decided to ramp it up to H4 for the bigger benefits. Lemme tell ya, it is a nightmare. In every game you load into, (regarless of difficulty besides tourist) you will get a swarm of bugs thrown at you. Maybe 2 to 3 times depending how long you stay in match. These swarms really are no joke if you or your teammates do not take them seriously. Such as your Digger or Gunner detonating their explosives too early, or too late; or even taking you down with their own explosive!  Well, I learned that it is actually possible for swarms to stack ontop of each other --- 2 team mates getting downed by baneling/kamikazee bugs because they WILL sneak up on you. You will find yourself running around the entire cave doing parkour making sure you do not make a slip up, because any slip up means death. Then after that, you find yourself running out of ammo and room. You find that opening and manage to pick up ONE team mate, only to find that the announcer is saying "Another swarm incoming" when you are not even half way through the first swarm...or even second. 

9/10 would hold the line with only a clip of ammo and my pickaxe left while the impending doom is crawling its way towards me.

40503007.review:
[h1]Бодрая кооперативная гриндилка с экшеном[/h1]

Мне понравилось, но кому-то скучновато может быть. Бегают 4 бородача (инженер, вояка, копатель и разведчик), собирают ресурсы. Цель миссии собрать определенное количество ресурсов. Периодически набегают жуки – мелкие и побольше (я видел 6-7 видов). Как все ресурсы собраны надо бежать к эвакуационному буру за 4 минуты - и тут начинается дикий экшен – жуки лезут со всех сторон. Одна сессия на 25 минут примерно. На средней сложности играешь на расслабоне. Пещер и типов местности и растительности много - не надоедает. Среди сложностей можно заблудиться и некоторым классам без посторонней помощи тяжело передвигаться. Есть перевод интерфейса на русский.

[h1]На что похожа:[/h1]

Left4dead+Evolve

[h1]Понравилось: [/h1]

+ Интересные механики игры: исследование пещер, гринд ресурсов, экшен с волнами врагов.
+ 4 класса персонажей с различающимся стилем игры.
+ Быстрые сервера, хорошая техническая часть – все летает, без лагов и вылетов.
+ Случайно генерируемые пещеры.
+ Приятный графический стиль.
+ Отличная озвучка бородачей.
+ Русская локализация текста.
+ Много русскоговорящих игроков (около половины).
+ Футуристичный сеттинг. Никаких тебе секир, молотов со щитами и гоблинов. Хотя кто знает что будет потом…
+ Относительно низкая цена для проекта такого типа. Покупал за 449 р. и покупкой доволен. 

[h1]Не понравилось: [/h1]

- Почти невозможно пройти карту в одиночку - тупо кончаются патроны. Пробовал инженером и копателем.

Очень понравилась концепция игры. 

[b]Моя оценка: 8,5 бородачей 10[/b]

40502100.review:
I was sold on the co-op action, but I didn't find it to deliver there. There's nothing that forces the players to work together, and usually all end up seperated, lost and wandering different directions.

There's no real map, or way to determine which direction is forward or backward. The only sign you are moving in the right direction is if you find a patch of brown dirt, that hasn't been dug... you may see blips indicating the direction of other players, but there's no way to tell which of these people is actually heading the correct way. Often times, the team fails because after 20 minutes of going in circles, nobody finds the correct path.

The world generation technology may have some cool uses in the future, but it doesn't create unique expereinces in the maps you play here. 

My advice to the devs, the game needs a more strict mechanic keeping the players in range of each other or the robotic assistant, for teamwork to happen. The classes don't compliment each other, for class choice to matter. And if it absolutely has to be a linear level path, then make sure you have feedback of which is the correct direction (personally I think it shouldn't be linear, and instead no direction should be wrong).

40500003.review:
One of the best co-op class-based games around.
Every class is unique and equally useful, teamplay is very rewarding and fun.
There's a big exploration drive due to everything being procedually generated, i've seen amazing caverns and shit.

Also i've seen just about every crab-like alien enemy there are, but they can surprise you every time.
Enemies are varied enough to keep it challenging.
For example small crabs might not be more than a nuisance in couples, but they often behave in swarm-like manners and become a real threat.

There's even the ceiling tongue abduction monsters from half life.

My squad of 4 random people was drilling a tunnel through a wall to get to an egg faster.
Upon accidentally popping the egg while drilling towards it, we hear a huge roar
Through the tiny gap we had a fucking enormous red spider monster came charging down our tunnel. 
It was a boss.
That shit was straight from lord of the rings.

That was a legit "oh SHIT" moment and the game is full of those, i'm loving it.
Definitely recommend it for full price.

40499763.review:
This game is such a breath of fresh air in all of the battle royale, mindless point and shoot games that are on the market right now.  For those of you who need to shoot other players, and need that twitch reaction based gameplay, this is not for you.  For players who are looking for a constantly changing, dynamic, intense, and downright fun experience this game is for you.  

This game really rewards teamwork, quick thinking, and game knowledge.  

I have only 2 complaints in the game, the first being the suicide bugs are silent right up until they start detonating right behind you as you are digging.  The second being the progression, while it exists, is not quite as deep as I'd hoped. 

The game more than makes up for these though by delivering a truly focused, challenging, and dynamic experience.  

Rock and stone, to the bone.

40499491.review:
This so far has been a great game to play. Most of the mechanics such as shooting, using certain equipment, movement, and general gameplay are very good. At times things like the mining and use of some equipment can feel  a little clunky and annoying but usualy works as intended. I dont mind this at all though because the game quite literally just went into early access so i am not worried. In the first hour I felt a bit overwhelmed by all of the equipment and objectives due to the intentional lack of guidance but after I sat down and read a couple of things I feel fairly confident about my understanding of the game. The "menu" if you can even call it that is basically a small hub where you can walk around and shop with friends or other players and feels very interactive and involved even if you really arent doing anything. Even though technically you can just walk away from your computer, sometimes it feels like there is no real break in between matches especially if the others you are playing with start a mission but I have not run into any issues with trolls that do this. The servers have been amazing for me so far and the load times are great. I have yet to find one immature player and the player base seems to mainly be made up of cool and mature dudes.

Things I think should be implemented:
-More help for new players besides the tutorial such as pop ups in the actual game
-some sort of drop pod calling confirmation because it is very frustrating when you are barelt halfway througha  level and a new player immediately calls the pod
-A bit more optimization, fix a few glitches, and maybe refine the movement a little (this is an early access game so all of these things are expected though)

Although it is a co-op game, there is also the solo option. You are partnered with a small robot friend who can help out a small bit but do not receive much other assistance. You seem to be at a major disadvantage playing solo andirons seems you need at least 2 people to have a somewhat effective team. Though I’m sure you could make it work, I would recommend staying away from solo if you can for now.

Overall it is a very simple and relaxing game at the slower parts and a hectic and intense game during swarms and extractions. The more and more I play though I relaize the game probably isnt for everyone thoug

40499085.review:
Are you sure this is early access? Deep Rock Galactic is one of the most solid shooters I've ever played. The game is very well optimized already, with beautiful graphics and stellar netcode. Only a couple of times did I have any connection issues but I'm pretty sure that was on my end. Controls are tight and gameplay doesn't get stale due to procedurally generated caves and caverns, and you're always worried about when the next swarm is going to stear your squad apart.

I think going class based was a great choice, since the game is PvE and focuses a lot on cooperation. You'll quickly find yourself asking your teammates to deploy one of their classes' special tools to help you get to hard to reach minerals. During a bad swarm you'll pray that you have an Engineer to put down automated sentries. You may even have to dig a tunnel through 100 meters of solid rock just to get to your dropship in time to extract from a mission.

I can't wait to see what updated come to this game. While it could have been released now as a full game, becasue it's in Early Access we'll probably see a lot of growth on this already solid game.

40496960.developer_response:
Most of the network errors reported are actually just a miscommunication problem. We're working on optimizing the conexion flow to make it more understandable for the players. In most cases, the network error message appears simply because the host left the game. While you are a host, you can't join a match, you have to disband the team first and then try to join. But, as I said, we will improve this flow soon.
As for the content, we have different game modes that you can unlock making for a different game experience. Our procedural system is designed to surprise players both in the short and long term, so if you stick to it, the caves will offer new and exciting challenges.
Enemies, mission types, items, and more variety in the procedural generation are our priorities. Thank you for supporting us, we will improve the game listening to the feedback of our community. Soon we will have a roadmap ready in which hopefully many of your concers will be addressed.

40496188.review:
The game is like a cross between Minecraft, Left 4 Dead, and Starship Troopers. You start off every level by landing in a drop pod which burrows deep undeground. You then need to find specific minerals, plants, or what have you from the surrounding caverns. To accomplish this, you dig through the terrain. You'll encounter everything from basic tunnels, to massive rooms, with multiple platforms. You'll need to use ziplines or build bridges to reach where you need to go. On the way, you'll be granted a courteous visit by some of the planets local inhabitants. These Insectoids/aliens don't really put up much of a fight, but eventually they'll arrive in large swarms, in which you'll need to stay close to your allies to survive. They come out of the ground, the ceiling, walls, in pretty much every direction. It get's crazy. Once you collect the goods, you need to retreat back to the evac point within 5 minutes, all the while endless swarms of enemies chase you down.

There are four classes you can choose from, and they all have a role to fit on the team. Scouts can quickly traverse the terrain, and light the surrounding area up with their flare gun. Gunners are effective at killing anything that appears, Drillers can tunnel through the terrain, and Engineers can build turrets and bridges. The classes are a little basic, but they get the job done.

Not a bad game, but a tad bit pricey.

40495341.review:
One of the best games I've ever played

Simple, straightforward, to the point 

You and 0-3 buddies go underground. you have to mine various ores in minecraft style digging in procedural maps that are destructible. Some ores complete the objective, some let you call in ammo drops, some give you more money once you finish the mission, and some are crafting materials you need to bring back in order to upgrade your gear. 

Unfortunately, the planet you're doing all this diggin in is inhabited by big, mean, ugly, bugs that don't take kindly to strangers digging in their turf 

4 classes, each with its own weapons and 1 movement gadget. You can have multiple of the same class in one game, and depending on the difficulty setting the game can vary from "being able to breeze through a mission on solo" to "holy f*ck all 4 of us are shooting the Pretorian and it wont f*cking die! WHY WONT IT DIE?!"

It has massive scope for improvement while remaining a very enjoyable title, I can see this as being a new pathway opening to great coop games that we have been sorely lacking.

40494828.review:
For as short of a time as i have played this game i can set several little opinions of the game
1. Sounds and Soundtrack
The soundtrack is amazing, with a quite... Retro and sci-fi feel to it, and added with the jukebox in the hub, there is plenty of good music to listen to, meanwhile, the sound design is ON point, while the voices could sound a bit more Dwarvish in my opinion, the sounds of the weapons, explosions, digging, and even monsters is amazing, shotguns have a powerful oomph, the minigun the Gunner has gives a very good spin up sound followed by a very clear to hear hail of bullets, grenades and the grenade launcher let out a powerful boom sound which is easy to distinguish, and hard to miss, although the soundtrack does occasionally get drowned out under all the gunfire.

2. Gameplay.
The game at its current state already feels finished gameplay-wise, each class feels defined, and with a purpose, no class is useless, and certainly not weak either, but thats where the good design of the game comes to light, the enemies can still overwhelm even a Gunner, so sticking together is a must, that, and together you have a higher chance of finding ore, quicker digging, and more quick ore collection, weapons are all unlocked from the start, and, although having a very simple upgrade system, still makes a difference, the game already, in its in development state feels fleshed out and well thought out.

3. Visuals.
Im sure we all agree, the game looks really pretty, the low poly style mixed with the good use of colors and light makes the caves feel very explorable, and the more complexity there is on a mission, the more freaky the caves get.
The Low Poly style also means the game runs very well on even a potato computer, and the use of colors really helps differentiate the classes, and the enemies, some are green and glow green, others glow bright orange, some are purple, etc. 

4. Barrels.
We all kicked them around.

5. Negatives.
There arent that many negatives, if any, obviously, as it is in an early state, there arent that many missions or enemies, but thats all fine, the one thing i would say is a bit in the way, is the fact that MULE tends to disobey your direct orders to be next to you, and instead wanders off into the ceiling, or, if you are in a high position, and want to send MULE to you, it tends to push you off whatever thin ledge you are standing on to your death. But, this is hardly an issue, as it is hilarious to see MULE plant itsself into the ceiling against your orders, only for it to then decide to listen, and walk down next to you.

All in all, this is a game im glad i bought, and im excited to see how it develops and changes over time.

英文不太好所以就写中文了
这是我在2018年3月2号玩时碰到的事情。那时我和3位路人一起任务，任务不难就是400墨矿。
但是我们当时花了30多分钟跑遍全图（自以为吧）没有全图也有90%了。墨矿的数量停在了389/400就是找不到了。最后我们没办法分头找被虫群都干死了。30分钟血本无归，心里有点难受。思来想去想到个建议，如果开发部有哪位懂中文的看见麻烦帮忙转达一下谢谢！
我提议》
建议在游戏中添加一只机械狗（反正都有骡子了）。机械狗的用处是自动寻找最近的1处未被开采过的任务矿的矿点。同时在行进时身后会留下荧光涂料，涂料会慢慢消失。狗狗发现任务矿后会在矿旁边发光并且叫。（停留一段时间当机）。当然狗和骡子一样是可以爬墙的！ 这么好用的东西不加个限制怎么成，所以狗狗召唤需要80或100的赤矿。这样可以防止狗狗被滥用。玩家也可以纠结到底是召唤补给还是狗狗！这样因为找不到任务矿活活被拖死的事情应给不会有很多了，大家付出了至少不会血本无归！
最后谢谢看完，这真心是个不错的游戏！

40494053.review:
I'm going to start with that this isn't a bad game, it has a lot of promise, my main gripe is that for £19 this is a pretty big overcharge. The game is extremely repeitive, apart from the different classes there are no different guns to unlock or use, so if you like one part of a class but hate it's weapons you're gonna have to just bite the bullet.

I understand that this is an early access game, but again on the price, early access or not, if you're charging £19 for a game your game should be worth that much, a lot of early access games are cheaper and add price as they add more and more features, now let's list some pros and cons.

Pros:
- beautiful lighting, light is a big part of this game and the system compliments that
- satisfying explosions, even though the gun feel has some work to be done, the explosions that wipe out tons of bugs are something to behold
- quick gameplay, you can easily jump straight into a game without worrying about any sort of set up
- satisfying grinding, finding resources and mining them is extremely fun and exciting, the main issue i have is that you constantly have to deposit your ores into the mule, and when you cant even hold a single vein's worth of metal it gets rather tedious

Cons
- Broken animations, reloading animations are extremely simple and even then, they clip through the gun's models
- Gun models, the current weapons in the game look like they're plastic toys and really damage the gun feel (And in a game all about shooting things, gun feel should be a priority)
- Gun feel, there's no real impact behind shooting things, there's no recoil, and the enemies dont even react when you shoot them in the face with a shotgun, the sounds of the guns are nothing to note either
- Extremely grindy, now even though the gathering is fun, it's kinda extreme, you have to choose between buying gun upgrades and buying cosmetics, which stings players who enjoy customisation
- Gun upgrades, for a game based around gathering things so you can upgrade your guns, it's extremely lack luster, each weapon has no more than 3 upgrades and they're not even slightly exciting; +2 to clip, slightly faster attack speed, that kinda thing.
- Repetitiveness, now random gen can be a boon to a game, but i feel like this game relies on it way too heavily, the world gen is janky and if you dont have a scout-engineer combo on your teem some materials can be a pain to gather. And apart from the different bioms, have fun seeing a lot of caves that seems exactly the same
- Backtracking, this is probably one of my bigger gripes with the game, sometimes you'll end up in a dead end, but you wont know you're in a dead end, so you'll search every nook and cranny looking for the dirt patch to mine through just to find there is none so you have to go back to where you've been before looking for a dirt patch that you missed or saw but forgot, there's a map you can use but it's pretty damn useless, it only shows a couple of meters in front of you and sometimes it can be misleading

All in all, i cant recommend it for the current price, in fact the way they put the biggest option on the main menu as the option to buy their "supporter upgrade" is an even bigger kick in the teeth, people who buy your game in early access is because they want to support your game, and you add a goddamn £11 dlc bundle that only has a couple of skins so people can support you, normally only free to play games will pull something like that. To support someone's game just for the main menu to greet you every time with "Buy our support pack" feels kinda disrespectful.

40490411.review:
Deep Rock Galactic is the love child of Left For Dead and Minecraft (without the crafting). Your objective is to traverse deep down into randomly generated mines, collect a specific mineral to fulfill a contract and then make it out alive, all while fighting a horde of alien creatures. To accomplish this, you play the role of one of four classes, each with unique tools. 

The Engineer is best known for his two buildable stationary turrets. He also has a specialized gun that allows you to shoot concrete platforms into the wall, making hard to reach areas accessible.

The Gunner carries a large-clip gatling gun and has the ability to shoot ziplines which the team can use to cross large gaps.

The Scout's flare gun lets him keep an area illuminated better than individual flares can for a longer period of time. He is also equiped with a personal grappling hook which allows him to speed ahead of the group or quickly collect a resource.

The Driller has two titanium drills he can equip to make short work of any terrain, or deal damage to enemies. His flamethrower is best for dealing with large groups of enemies, and ignores the armor of larger enemies.

This is one of very few games where I feel having one of each class as opposed to stacking classes is extremely beneficial to every mission. Caves are randomly generated, have different terrain based on the biome the mission is taking place in, and each comes with different biome specific hazards. There are several different mission types, including mineral collection, point extraction, and 'boss hunting'. Ghost Ship Games have already proven their ability to receive feedback from the community, and patched an extremely requested feature on day 2. I have had lots of fun with this game already, and am excited to see the direction they take it in their 1-2 year anticipated early access.

40489499.review:
Годный, крайне годный продукт, который я изначально не оценил с первого раза и хотел вернуть деньги, однако потом зашел во второй раз, и знаете... Так у меня уже не впервые. Если вы знакомы со Star Wars: Empire at War, Battlefront 1 и 2 (эпохи нулевых, а не это новомодное эпическое мочилово), Morrowind и несколько других игр, то мое знакомство с ними было абсолютно таким же, только возврата денег за диски тогда не было. Не думайте, я не ставлю Deep Rock Galactic на одну полочку с ними, но это весьма и весьма занимательная игра, на которую стоит взглянуть.

Геймплей не особо сложен: вы водиночку либо с друзьями/рандомными тиммейтами спускаетесь в недра небольшой планеты с задачей отыскать определенные ресурсы. Здесь вам могут помешать различные монстры, которые, в силу того, что действие игры происходит в темноте, подбираются к вам зачастую незаметно. Естественно, огромную елдобину со светящимся задом трудно не заметить, но вот рой мелких его подлиз вполне можно упустить. Тьму негостеприимных пещер планеты разгоняют светящиеся кристаллы, коих немного, и ваши «фаеры», которые можно раскидывать. Светят они недолго и требуют перезарядки запаса, чтобы бросить еще, так что сверкающий подиум себе не выстроишь.
В игре есть четыре класса брутальных бородатых (или свежебритых, но с тремя подбородками) гномов. Инженер сооружает турели и платформы для удобства добычи, вооружен гранатометом и дробвиком. Разведчик лучше освещает дорогу и может добраться в трудодоступные места, бурильщик быстрее прокладывает дорогу через стены, а стрелок... Он везде стрелок. Здоровенный пулемет в его волосатых бравых ручищах скажет за него все, что он сам не сможет. 
Между миссиями можно сменить внешний вид и снаряжение, нацепить новую шапку или забабахать себе другую бороду. Со всем этим выбора пока немного, но ведь это же альфа, я надеюсь на добавления. Еще больше надеюсь, что разработчики не станут слишком заострять внимание на косметических аспектах и будут развивать игру в целом.
Отдельный плюс за музыкальное сопровождение. Футуристическая музыка тут, как ни странно, очень уместная, звучит она прекрасно. 
Кроме того, на базе можно станцевать вприсядку и попинать бочки, чем здорово бесится наш работодатель.
Говорю ребятам из Ghpst Ship Games ОГРОМНОЕ СПАСИБО за новую игровую влюбленность, которая будет составлять теперь большую часть моего времени за компьютером. 

Добавляйтесь, господа, буду рад с вами поиграть.

40489469.review:
可能是最近除了MHW唯一想玩的Co-op游戏。不知不觉在野队玩了3个小时，游戏整体还不错8/10
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
游戏性：
多人合作很必要，四个兵种都有不可替代的作用，但是少于四个人也并不是不能玩，只是人数越少越缺乏各兵种配合，有些明明可以配合的点就只能硬刚，相应的游戏性也会变弱。
目前整体的职业设定还算不错，大体上是每种职业两个输出武器，两个功能性工具。但是gunner和engineer有个技能是不是弄反了？游戏最强的zipline位移工具在输出身上，最强的输出工具在辅助身上？？虽然工程师造炮台这已经是惯性思维了，但是在游戏里总觉得还是给gunner更加符合逻辑。
游戏地图我不知道是什么随机生成机制，目前玩过的火山，晶体矿脉和植物坑貌似是三个不同的星球？因为都是第一次玩所以还比较有新鲜感。问题是太容易迷路了，游戏最大的难题不是怎么采到天花板的矿和杀虫子而是找不到路，理论上应该是看能量棒认路，但是还是很晕。
只玩过挖矿模式其他的先不说。
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
美术风格整体是比较怀旧向的。像TF2，人物和道具的设定都比较卡通化，而且也并不美型（矮人美个鬼）。地图以HighPoly的感觉为主，因为是可以破坏地形的，这点和astroneer（5毛拿好，滚）。整体上该有的都有了，矮人，杀伤性枪械，神奇工具，外星蜘蛛，太空站，异星地貌。如果要是有多人乘坐的mech用来临时打boss岂不是很社保（做梦）。

40489156.review:
I haven't had this much fun with a game in some time. Once I started playing I could not stop. The formula is brilliant and so is this game. Well worth the price and I can't wait to see where it goes from here. If you like coop shooters you are going to love this game and I highly recommend it for all ages. It can be played solo but obviously better with a group. It even includes a quick match option for pug games and full voice support!

From the excellent gameplay and responsive controls to the beautiful procedural crafted levels that change every time you play, this game does everything right. Not only does it look fantastic with it's dynamicly lit vibrant color palette but this game has godly unreal engine optimization that is optimized for four players and multiple light sources and gunfire going off everywhere with hordes of enemies coming at you from all angles.

Did I mention the entire map is deformable with full environmental damage? The music and audio was also flawless and really captured the feel and sounds of the game. From the epic music to the beefy gunfire and audiable feedback from the dwarves, the game sounds great! No audio clipping or popping or anything to speak of either. Even the netcode was a champ under high latency conditions and allowed a group of us from all over the world to play and have fun without worrying about anything but having a good time.

The game might be early access but is extremely polished at this point. It has a nice clean UI and server browser that is easy to read. Not only can you see and tell other players where things are in the game with visual indicators but the dwarves also speak and say all kinds of hilarious things through the course of a game. This makes communicating without voice possible and funny. Four different classes with upgrades and a level based progression system including vanity items make it even more juicy. Mouse and keyboard worked great as did the gamepad. I look forward to playing more and seeing more content as the game is developed. I had an absolute blast playing Deep Rock Galactic!

40488732.review:
[h1] Работайте вместе или умрите в одиночестве! [/h1]

Deep Rock Galactic - это игра, сочетающая в себе Left 4 Dead и Minecraft. В ней присутствует 4 класса: пулемётчик, дриллер, инженер и разведчик, у каждого из которых свои особенности. Например, пулемётчик может ставить тросы для передвижения над пропастью, инженер - ставить турель и строить небольшие выступы на стенках, дриллер может быстро пробурится сквозь скалы, а разведчик даёт освещение команде и также очень мобильный класс. Игра пока находится в альфе, но уже имеет огромный потенциал. Надеюсь, что этот проект не бросят и не оставят без внимания. 

8 Rock and Stone / 10

40483415.review:
Description:
Deep rock galactic is a CO-OP first person shooter. It's round based, and up to 4 people can play. There are four classes to chose from, each with their own items. The engineer, who has turrets, a gun that shoots walls, a combat shotgun, and a grenade launcher. The gunner has a gatling gun, a heavy pistol, a zip-line gun (which is just as cool as it sounds) and C4. The driller has drill arms, a flamethrower, a rocket launcher, and C4. The last class, the scout, has the least fun grappling hook in the entire world (you can't swing from it) a flare gun (which shoots flares farther, has them stick to walls, and are brighiter than normal flares) an assault rifle, and a sawed off shotgun. Everyone gets 3 grenades, 3 recharging flares, and a pickaxe. All consumables like ammo and grenades can be refilled by mining nitra and ordering a drop pod in the cave. Everything in this game can be destroyed, except the robots that come into the cave with you. If you go alone, you get a helper robot who shines lights on things, mines, and shoots enemies for you. Whether you're alone or have 4 people, a MULE bot comes with you that can be relocated on command and is there for you to deposit your materials into. Depending on the class you play, there are upgrades and a ranking system for each class. So if you play a class a lot, you can upgrade it using credits and materials found on misisons. 


My personal opinion:
The game is awesome! I bought it and played it for 6 hours straight with my friends without even noticing. However, it might get a little repetitive if you play it a lot. Each mission has a singular objective and an optional objective as well as difficulty settings that give you bonuses if you play them on harder difficulties. If you don't have friends, you can still join games or host and have others join your games, but it won't be as fun.

Analysis: Dwarf dancing simulator 2018

40482443.review:
So let's see... You have..

-Mining
-Exploration
-Aliens
-Co-Op
-Procedurally-generated Levels
-Weapon & Armor Upgrades

and Dwarf Miners in Space... Need I say more?
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Seriously this game caught me off-guard. I normally stay away from Early Access games and/or Mining games but when I saw what this game was offering... it was a recipe for a new addiction.

It is totally friendly towards solo players too. You are not pressured to play in Co-Op if you don't want too.

The learning curve is super super easy too. Within 10mins, your spelunking a cave on your own, fighting off aliens as you go. You also have the assistance of a helper droid who fights and mines with you.

One thing I really enjoy is the "pack mule" robot that follows you. He's this giant crab looking droid that deposits what you find in the caves. You can literally call him to any location and he'll make it there. 

In between missions, you hang out in the mothership and spend your loot on upgrades or new weapons and armor. You can also rock out and dance to metal music near the jukebox machine ! Basically it's a really great lobby system that functions like a hub world and is a nice break in between missions.

If your new to sandbox mining games like myself, this is the perfect game to ease you into the genre. It's got a perfect mix of mining and Alien a$$-kicking. I am sure veterans of the mining sandbox genre will find this refreshing as well.

8.5/10   ----   It's a diamond in the rough

No better way to simulatenously bring friends together and then rend those friendships apart. This game will have your heart racing and give you a great sense of claustrophia and provide hours and hours of entertainment. I highly recommend this title to anyone.

40480403.review:
A smooth and almost bugless experience. It captures what it wants to be very well. Imagine a first person Helldivers mixed with a voxel sandbox world like a cubeless minecraft. It's almost as polished as a blizzard game.

Pros
- Runs very well, starts up almost immediately
- A very fun and simplistic co-op game
- High replayability because it never really ends.
- A really nice simplistic art-style and nice VFX

Cons
- Not much content
- it's early access so that means a lot of the game is not finished
- Only 2 Voice Actors and it becomes more and more apparent the more you hear each dwarf say the same thing over and over and over again.
- The occasional bug with characters customization, pathing
- No physics, just like minecraft where things that are not intended to float will, like a random speck of rock hovering a few feet of the ground.

40479879.review:
After playing the Closed Alpha (or, I guess, the "Alpha Closed Alpha"), I was blown away even then.

Ever since i was a wee lad, building my Rock Raiders Lego sets and thinking about blind cave salamanders, I wanted to play a game where you explore caves and do various cave related activites, like finding fossils or fighting trogloditic wildlife. This game delivers on that premise. Not to mention, it has a nice, low-poly, artstyle. That's always a plus, in my book.

Each of the 6 areas missions take place in are incredibly visually distinct and appealing (I'm partial to the red salt one, myself), and even have there own unique flora, fauna, and rare minerals. The missions are randomaly generated and rated by both Length and Complexity, so you can play a relatively straight-forward mission if you're in a hurry, or a massive maze if you have time to get cozy.

You play as [strike]squats[/strike] dwarfs fighting giant insects in caves, mining various space minerals and wielding satisfying weapons.
There are 4 classes of Dwarf: 
[olist]
[*]The Engineer, the defensive option. Turrets, grenade launchers, and shotguns. This is probably the best option for starting out, as it's the most well-rounded.
[*]The Gunner, the offensive option. Miniguns, revolvers, and satchel charges. This dwarf is almost solely focused on offense, but good for solo missions due to his powerful weapons and extremely useful zipline gun.
[*]The Miner, the industrious option. Drills and flamethrowers. This dwarf is fun to play as, having one of the most satisfying flamethrowers in a game I've ever played, but is dependent on at least one other player to be viable due to his lack of high-mobility tools.
[*] The Scout, the support option. Flareguns, grappling hooks, stun grenades. Challenging when solo, but invaluable when with a group.
[/olist]

No matter how many players there are, the gameplay can become incredibly tense and frantic at a moments notice. While the mission might be going well, flawless even, one moment, it can quickly turn into a Klendathu Drop scenario where your dwarfs are overwhelmed by hundreds of Glyphids. Not to mention the 5 minute ending timer, where you and your team's survivors try to get to evac as fast as possible while wave after wave of hostiles crawl out from all around you.
I still have memories from the Alpha Closed Alpha of close escapes with only seconds remaining, or completing a mission without a scratch.

A game that encapsulates everything I liked as a kid; and still do today. Top quality.

40478281.review:
I can honestly say I've enjoyed this game a lot more than any game I've played in the last year or two.  The mechanics of playing to each classes strengths in co-op is very well done.  I also like a co-op game where I don't feel like I'm fighting my team members for stuff.  In this game you're all in it together.  Whatever the team gets at the end is rewarded to everyone, mats, money and XP.  The care taken with the drone so that solo players aren't left alone is a nice touch. 

Now people are saying it  lacks content but me and a buddy have been playing for a little bit and feel like we still keep running into new content and situations.  That's where the real "content" is, its the situations.  That and small things you learn.  For example we noticed what looked like white bubbles in the dirt, we started digging into it and found a large pearl.  Like you have to carry it, with both hands to the molly.  We soon realized, when you see that kinda dirt theres always a pearl hidden in there somewhere.  Its just little things like that which make me fall in love with this title.

The overall theme and feel is awesome, its gruff but comical.  The art style is well done, and the lighting, or lord the lighting.  Nothing beats throwing a light stick down a dark tunnel and seeing it light up as it goes.  And the music just fits so perfectly for the action and overall mood setting.

One of the best games I've played in a while! Me and a buddy are always looking for a good co-op game and this crushes it.  It triggers my inner horder, peaks my inner explorer and feeds my inner shooter.  If this is only early access I can't wait to see where this goes.

Can't recommend enough!

40477928.review:
Deep Rock Galactic is a bit repetitive at its core--you go to the caves, get something, and come back. In most games, that kind of formula doesn't lend itself to an engaging experience. In DRG, the gameplay and environment manage to make mining a blast, and the quirky tone somehow keeps it charm even after you've heard the same lines two dozen times each.

There's room for improvement--I had to repeat the tutorial to learn how to call in a resupply because the control menu doesn't list the key, and, of course, actually being able to remap controls would be fantastic. Those aside, DRG is already a perfectly good game, and can only get better as Ghost Ship works more on it.

40475698.review:
This game has potential but at the moment, the content is lacking. The game feels fresh and fun when playing the first time but after you clear a level, it doesn't feel the same anymore. The enemies are limited, the progression is just not there and its just not fun for people who want to achieve more. The current progression system has small upgrades which don't really mean anything such as "+5 Seconds on your flare time" and "+10 more bullets in your gun". There are no extra abilities and there is no loot that either makes you look different or gives you upgrades / different abilities.

If you enjoy running the same kind of level over and over again then by all means buy it. The game is very optimized and has a very unqiue system with being able to blow up anything in the world. If you are looking for a game with a lot of content, its not for you. Its understandable that its early access but it doesn't have enough for me at least. Might be a buy later on after it leaves early access.

40475662.review:
Dwarfs, Digging, Destroying local flora and fauna in a area that is procedural generated.. whats not to love!?

The game is simple but fun..
Deploy, complete objectives(find x of y resource etc), extract, profit.
Progression is via levels that unlock cosmetics and upgrades for your equipment.
You purchase these items via credits and special resources you collect when doing missions.

The game scales from 1-4 players fairly well so even if you only want to run in a group of 2 or 3 this is possible.
For the solo players you get to command an AI hovering drone that can dig, fight and collect.

Having only played a couple hours and skipping through the classes so not really progressing the variation in game-play is my only concern.
There are different types of missions that you can do once you reach a higher level so hopefully these should create some slightly different mission types and challenges.

All in all, its been a fun game thus far, and really enjoyable to play.

3月7日36小时追评：

交友神器！通过玩DRG我已经认识了将近20位工友了！
CN服务器质量相当高，目前未碰见卡顿情况，仅掉线一次；
只要游戏时间段合适（别大早上六点钟起来玩，也别周一至周五上班时间），非常好找到组织或加入你队伍的小伙伴；
音乐劲爆，射击手感好；

我目前是满级工程师、9级钻头、3级加特林和1级侦查，大概说一下操作和定位（最高难度）：
1.工程师是我用的最顺手的了，绝对堪称风筝王。最牛逼的就是三级护甲，不怕毒，这就导致你可以随便钻进毒气里面把队友拉起来。榴弹伤害高范围广，如果队伍里就剩你自己了而且还被怪群追赶，配合平台炮后完全可以自己把场地清理干净然后再去救人，或者把怪弄远迅速回去救人。炮台比较废物，应该属于凑数的技能或给新手用的。主武器战斗霰弹枪升级后也厉害，在你枪法好的前提下，打中型的墨绿色蜘蛛爆头一下一个，打巨型亮绿色护甲蜘蛛往脸上喷，五发一个，不需要打屁股。这个人物就是托比昂+PREY里的GLOO炮，哈哈。
2.钻头，很多人说钻头是最垃圾的职业，包括我之前也是这么认为的，但后来研究了一下后发现完全不是这么回事。首先最需要注意的是，钻头的确是初期弱，但升级升满后你再看吧，绝对的狠角色。另外官方介绍中说到的“在团队里钻头也是不可忽视的DD”这话并没有错，为什么呢，因为他的火焰喷射器和钻头啊，喷火器无视护甲、范围大、并且喷到后就可以用小手枪biubiubiu了，因为敌人已经烧着了会持续掉血。被怪群包围了怎么办，有钻头在自己就能处理，烧完就跑，怪太狠了不要紧，钻头还配有C4呢！然后说说他的两个钻的作用，我认为日常挖墙除非比较刁钻的位置，不然大家一起用镐子凿就可以了，不要浪费开山神钻的燃料，钻头这个武器无论是撤退时替队友开道还是被怪围攻时给自己解围那可是紧急救生器，而且你把钻头升级后再看那伤害，什么？觉得不高？那你再看看钻头的攻速和攻击范围吧。。
3.加特林这个职业也是必不可少的，并不因为他的加特林，而是C4和缆车，这两个技能就不用介绍了，都是神技。主要说一下机枪兵的攻击，主武器为大威力转轮手枪，威力超大啊，你要喜欢玩麦克雷认为自己枪法好的就用它去爆怪头打怪屁股吧保证爽死你，加特林呢也就算是个副武器，遇到怪群了突突一波，没啥卵用。
4.侦察兵比较有意思了，玩的人最多，我自己不愿意玩，但是队伍里如果没有他我会觉得别扭，可能因为我喜欢在高处搭台子让他踩着挖矿吧，哈哈。飞锁神技不多介绍，值得注意的是双管喷子，伤害爆表，贴脸就是一顿喷啊，sawed-off可不是闹着玩的。不过要是论团队总输出，侦察兵应该是垫底的，但毕竟是侦察兵嘛，本来就不是杀敌的存在，他的价值并不在这里，而是为团队提供高于杀敌的价值。

总结：游戏在现阶段来讲确实容易腻，不过这是这类游戏的通病，并不是作品本身无聊。而且最重要的是注意看等待大厅，里面一堆房间都还没开，不知道以后制作组会带给我们什么惊喜呢，拭目以待吧。

40475024.review:
Test tout frais :

Ce jeu détend, fait peur, rire, le café et la vaisselle. La M.U.L.E. est complètement bourrée mais c'est ce qui fait son charme.

On se sent vite opressé dans les étroits et sombres tunnels avant d'être captivé arrivé dans d'énormes grottes de cristaux luminescents. Que peu d'heures de jeu mais on peut sentir le potentiel de DRG dès les premières minutes de découvertes. À voir comment le jeu évoluera, mais vu son état actuel dors et déjà attirant et amusant, je peux déjà sentir les heures de jeu intenses et complètement déjantées des parties en coop à venir.

Bref, au vu des possibilités que les dév ont devant eux quant à l'évolution du jeu, ça vaut clairement le coup. À voir si le jeu ne devient pas répétitif avec le temps, affaire à suivre de très prêt.

Dans tous les cas, si vous hésitez, dites vous qu'avec ce jeu vous avez la possibilité de faire tranquillement de la tyrolienne en tant que nain avec une sale gueule dans une grotte infestée d'aliens. Et rien que pour ça croyez-moi, ça vaut le coup d'oeil.

40474568.review:
I wanted to love and support this game. I offered some very critical but very honest feedback after purchasing and playing a couple missions solo. A couple fanboys took offense to my honesty and trolled me. When I responded, Dwarfurious banned me without warning. Am requesting refund, will never support this team again. This game could have been wonderful. It could have been as big or bigger than Left For Dead 1 and 2. Oh well.

In order for the community to thrive we will need to accept each other’s constructive criticism. The game has a solid base but has a long way to go. We can’t insta-ban people for voicing concerns.

The brief synopsis of my concerns with the game are as follows. I posted much more in detail on the forum before I was unjustifiably banned by a power hungry mod. It’s a shame that the community is already eating itself.

My criticism of the game is as such: it has a solid gameplay loop as the base experience but desperately needs fleshed out progression system for longevity sake and also desperately needs mission variety. The “dangling carrot” effect is there but very mildly at the moment.

Also, I find lack of cross play between steam and win/Xbox base disappointing. Gigantic died because of that splinter base. Rocket League pulls this off so why can’t others? 

For 25 dollars right now a decent value because I can see myself spending 30 hours with a game like this, but with the improvements I recommended this game could have a Diablo 3 style replayability.

People will say “PUBG and Overwatch” didn’t need those things, but those games have millions of players, this game has 2000 on Steam right now. Hard to compare the two
40474568.developer_response:
I am sorry to hear that you had a bad experience in the forums of the game. We are happy to hear the that you consider our game to have potential and we definitely value your feedback.

We just  came out in Early Access trying to offer the best possible experience. But yes, we're in Early Access and that means that plenty has yet to be built. For us, and for many in our community, this is an exciting time. We want to keep improving both the main gamplay loop and the systems around it. We are committed to create an engaging long term experience to share with others or to play alone. We listen to our community thorugh many channels (including surveys, Discord, forums, etc.) and we will continue to do so in order to deliver the best possible product.
Players are different and, while some consider what we offer to be plenty and want us to focus on something specific, others need different aspects to act as a "dangling carrot" as you mention. We will try to please as many as possible by creating a game that can be adopted to players with different expectations and preferenced. This game has been made out of passion by a group of developers trying to create a game that they would love to play and that is still our goal. So trust us, we'll do our best. Soon we will share our roadmap and hopefully you will see some of your concerns addressed there.

40474056.review:
一定時間ごとに迫りくるエイリアンを撃退しながら鉱石を掘り掘りするゲーム
エンジニア　ガンナー　スカウト　ドリラー　の四種類のジョブがあり　連携することがとても大事
とりあえずどの職で始めるかお悩みの方　初心者の方に　参考になれば幸いです
色々書きすぎてごちゃごちゃしてしまったので　
お手数ですが見づらい方は　おすすめ　のあたりをクリックして　全文表示でお読みください


人の少ない時間帯にプレイする方は　やりたいステージに人がいない事があるとおもいます
その場合はsteam画面の左上
steam→設定→ダウンロード→ダウンロード地域　の順にクリックして
US Los Angeles や　New York あたりを選択
steamを再起動すると　USのサーバーに繋がるようになります
ラグは殆ど無く　プレイヤーも多いので　きっとお望みの部屋が見つかるはず
日本の友達と遊ぶ時にはこの設定を日本に戻しておくことを忘れずに

ジョブ紹介

エンジニア　
戦闘では強力なタレットとグレネードランチャー使って味方を支援
近づかれた場合はショットガンで応戦できる　
タレットは弾切れになると動かなくなるので　どんどんリロードしよう
タレットはＲ長押しで回収できるので　襲撃が止んだら次の敵襲に備えて回収しておくと良い

採掘では足場を作る特殊な銃で補佐していくスタイル
足場を作る銃は弾数にあまり余裕が無く
自分で高い場所や崖を超えたりすることが難しいため機動性に欠ける
後述のスカウトと相性が良いが　味方全員スカウトだったりすると
機動性の悪さによって　よく置いてけぼりにされる　悲しい

ガンナー
戦闘では超連射のガトリングガンで敵を一気に殲滅できる　
ボスの体力だってガンガン減らせる火力特化型
しかし調子にのって撃ちまくってるとすぐにオーバーヒートする
このガトリングガンは撃ち続けると精度がどんどん上がり
リコイルもほぼ不要なので　乱射して弾幕を張るような使い方は非常にもったいない
しっかりと弱点を狙い撃っていこう
サブウェポンのハンドガンは中々の高火力　遠くの敵を狙い打ちたいときに便利
こいつの所持している爆弾はとても高威力で　緑の大蜘蛛を一撃で爆殺できるが
ついでに範囲内にいる仲間も一撃で爆殺するので　狭いところで使うのは控えよう

採掘ではジップラインガンで遠く離れた場所と今いる場所をつなげることができる
即席ロープウェイみたいな感じで　味方も利用できる　勝手に消えたりはしない　
高い壁面にある鉱石を掘りに行ったりもできる　便利　


スカウト
戦闘ではショットガンとアサルトライフル　グラップルガンで縦横無尽に駆け回る
フレアガンで広く視界を確保しながら　敵を弱体化させるグレネードを投げ
アサルトライフルでは遠くにいる厄介な敵や　接近してきた小型の敵を排除　
味方に向かっている敵の後方へグラップルガンで飛んでいき
近距離からショットガンを撃ちこむ等
単純な火力では他職に劣るものの　腕次第（重要）で多彩な活躍ができるすごいやつ


採掘ではエンジニアの作ってくれた足場にグラップリングガンで飛び乗り採掘をしたり
フレアガンで広範囲の視野を確保したり
唯一無二の機動力を活かして素早く鉱石を発見　次へのルート（茶色の土）を見つけるのが仕事

このゲームで任務失敗する原因の殆どが
次へのルートや鉱石が見つからず長時間探索したあげくの弾切れ
ちゃんと仕事をするスカウトが一人いれば　これを防げる（多分）

ガンナーのジップラインガンと似たようなグラップルガンという銃を持っているが
こちらはお一人様専用一方通行　いわゆるフックショット　使用中に採掘等は一切出来ない
連射はできず　一定時間（５秒程度）チャージする必要がある
しかしチャージするだけで無限に使えるので　どんどん使おう

エンジニアに足場を作ってもらえば　これを使ってどんな場所の鉱石でも一発で採掘できる
あらゆる場面でかなりの時間を短縮できるので　
仲間のエンジニアに声をかけて足場を作ってもらおう

高いところから落ちても　地面に触れる前に地面に向かって撃ちこむと
なぜか落下ダメージを無効化できるので　とっさに取り出せるようにしておくと安心

これをジップラインガンのように使って落下死してる人を結構見るので注意
この機動力を活かして　落下死した人の救助等はスカウトが受け持つと楽



ドリラー
名前からして掘るのがメインで戦闘苦手なサポートジョブだとおもったら大間違い
戦闘では火炎放射機で大から少まで燃やし尽くす放火魔と化す
割と頻繁に出てくる正面からの銃撃をほぼ無効にする敵も　炎にはかなわずこんがり焼かれる　
欠点は　射程が短い＋大ボスの赤い大蜘蛛にはあまり対抗手段がない所
ついでにガンナーと同じ強力な爆弾を所持している

採掘ではさらにすごい　めちゃめちゃ掘る　どこまでも掘る
壁面に沿って掘れば高いとこでもどこにでも行けるし　どんな場所の鉱石だってお手の物
ただし調子に乗って掘り進むとサクっと落下死するので慎重に
ドリルは燃料の他に　連続で使用するとオーバーヒートする
押しっぱなしでつかうとすぐにオーバーヒートするので　ちょこちょこ休みながら使うと良い
任務の最後に　時間制限付きで開始地点まで帰還する事になるのだが
コイツがいれば道分からなくて迷ってても　一直線に脱出ポッドに掘り進んでいけば大体帰れる
個人的に絶対１人は欲しいジョブ



分かり難い操作方法等

Ｖキー　掛け声　ドワーフの挨拶みたいな物　とりあえずやると誰かしら返してくれる


Ｘキー　自分の位置を強調表示して仲間を呼ぶ　次の道へのルートを見つけたとき　
　　　　ダウンした時の救助要請等に

Ｘキー長押しor CTRL長押し　味方の位置を表示したり現在入手した鉱石の数等を確認できる　
　　　　　　　　　　　　　　ここをみてnitraが８０以上あれば補給品ポッドを呼べる

Ｆキー　フレアを投げる　時間経過で勝手に補充されるのでどんどん投げよう
　　　　戦闘中に周りにフレアがあると無いとでは戦いやすさが全然違うので地味に重要

Ｘキー or ＣＴＲＬ ＋左クリック　自分が照準を合わせている物質にマーカーをつける　
　　　　　　　　　　　                 ここに鉱石があるぞ！と知らせたい時に


5キー　補給品ポッドの要請　nitraという赤い鉱石を８０消費して弾薬等を補充できる　
　　　  全員合わせて四回しか補充できないので　補充は一人一回まで
             ちなみに降ってきた補給品ポッドに直撃すると即死する

Ｃキー　プレイヤーの後をｶﾞｼｬｶﾞｼｬついてくる鉱石箱ロボットを指定の位置に呼び寄せる　
　　　　鉱石を持ちきれないとき　たくさんの鉱石を発見した時に　


敵の対処法

小さい蜘蛛　小さい上に数が多いので銃だと狙いにくい　
　　　　　　後ろに下がりながら右クリのツルハシで撲殺するのが良い　

明るい赤の蜘蛛　　　銃撃されるか近づくと爆発するタイプで結構頻繁に出現する
　　　　　　　　　　一気にシールドが剥がれるくらいのダメージをうけるので
　　　　　　　　　　できるだけ遠くにいる間に撃って爆発させておこう

緑の大きな蜘蛛　お尻か頭に攻撃を当てないと無効化される　自分に向かってきているのなら
　　　　　　　　注意を引いて仲間に倒してもらうのもアリ　火炎放射器に弱い

ワーム　天井から触手を伸ばしてゴツい髭のおっさんを捕らえて逝かせるヤバい奴
　　　　仲間に助けてもらわないと脱出できない上にすぐ死ぬので　
　　　　単独行動時に捕まったら終わり
　　　　本体は強くないので適当に撃てば簡単に死ぬが　
　　　　天井に貼りついていて　真っ暗で全然見えないので
　　　　初心者は大体こいつにやられる　
　　　　そしてやられた初心者を助けに行った初心者もやられる
　　　　初見時私はこいつ一匹に４人抜きされて全滅しました　
　　　　なんもない場所で味方が死んでたらまず上方の確認を
　　　　全く同じ場所で重なるように二人目が死んだら絶対にこいつの仕業

大きめの赤い蜘蛛　遠くから謎の液体を飛ばしてきます　
　　　　　　　　　強くはないけどｳｻﾞｲ

大きめの紫蜘蛛　遠くから蜘蛛の糸を飛ばしてきます　当たると視界がめちゃんこ悪くなる　
　　　　　　　　とてもｳｻﾞｲ

特大サイズの赤蜘蛛　主に討伐任務で出現　極稀に他の任務でも出現する
　　　　　　　　　　他の蜘蛛には無い強力な遠距離攻撃をしてくるので　
　　　　　　　　　　距離が離れてても油断は禁物


アーリーアクセスのゲームなので　
アップグレード要素や　装備の種類等は少々物足りない感じですが
そんな現状でも結構楽しめます
ゴツくてブサイクなドワーフが集まって謎のダンスを踊ったりしてるだけでも楽しいです
値段分の価値は十分にあると思いました

40473973.review:
TLDR; If you're a solo player, I'd say wait and see. But if you're into co-op... definitely a decent buy if you don't mind the a lack of polish at the moment. (which is understandable at this point in its development)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Decent game, lots of promise, but at the moment there there seems to be a few bugs and balance issues if you're a single player. (this is advertised as single player as well as co-op)

Officially, the game is suppose to scale to however many people are in your group, but from what I can tell, either the difference is barely noticeable or it's completely broken. I've played solo all the way up to 4 players and the sheer number of MOBs and waves of swarms doesn't seem to change that much. (or as much as I believe it should)

As a single player, you'll have a really tough time ever finishing a mission. Even the easiest ones. (you still get some credit even if you fail, which is nice)

Also the BOT/Drone you get in single player glitches more than it helps. Pathing issues, getting stuck, firing at non existant enemies, blocking your mining path constantly while you're chipping away and raining down bullets on you since there is friendly fire from it as well... are just a few issues I've noticed.

I really hate that Steam only allows you to rate a game thumbs up or down as it's never quite black & white for games such as this and so early in EA.

All in all I say if you're a solo player, absolutely wait... if you're heavily into co-op, I'd say it's worth it if you don't mind a lack of polish and some minor performance issues. (again, understandable in EA)

Will update my review as things change, which I'm sure they will. From the looks of it, there's a really solid development team behind this title.

40473701.review:
[h1]Info zu Deep Rock Galactic von Coffee Stain Publishing [Update 03.03.2018][/h1]
Diese Review/Produktübersicht beschäftigt sich mit dem technischen Aspekt der Datenerhebung innerhalb des genannten Titels.

--

Während der Laufzeit von Deep Rock Galactic sind diverse Dienste im Hintergrund aktiv, die Infos zu Hard und Softwaredaten als auch Ingameverhalten der Nutzer weitergeben. Diese sind wenn sie gelassen werden, permanent aktiv.

Nähere Details können unter der
[url=https://www.deeprockgalactic.com/privacy-policy]Datenschutzerklärung[/url] von Deep Rock Galatic nachgelesen werden...oder aufgeschlüsselt hier ;]

[h1][Überarbeitete Angaben des Reviews sind am Ende zu finden][/h1]

Google bekommt via Trackingpixel vom Spieler eine eindeutige ClientID, GeoID in Verbindung mit der SteamID, Betriebssystem, Auflösung in Verbindung mit dem eingestellten sichtbaren Bereich

Stathat bekommt Infos zu Spielstarts (mitsamt Counter), ausgewählter Klasse (mitsamt Counter), Infos zu eingestecktem Schaden (z.b. von Spider_Tank_C), Spielertode/Wiederbelebungen, wurde eine Mission abgebrochen?, Spielzeit und vieles anderes. Im Endeffekt wird wieder mehr oder weniger jede Aktion des Spielers aufgezeichnet.

Beide Adressen sind im Hintergrund permanent aktiv und aktualisieren sich fortlaufend selbst. Beispiel-Übergabestrings im Rawformat sind auch in den Kommentaren zu finden

[h1]Involvierte Domains:[/h1]
[list]
[*] api.stathat.com
[*] www.google-analytics.com
[/list]

[h1]Als Ergänzung und Hinweis zu Neuerungen der integrierten Spiele-Analytics[/h1]
Mit dem Update vom 2. März 2018 wurde ein Patch für Deep Rock Galactic nachgereicht, mit dem diese Analytics für den Kunden "optional" geworden sind. D.h. diese werden sofern die Metrics zur Produktverbessung deaktiviert werden, nur [u]einmalig[/u] Datenbestände erfasst.

Via Ingame-Optionmenü lassen sich unter dem Punkt "[u]Send Gameplay Metrics[/u]" erwähnte Dienste seitens des Spielers deaktivieren. 

Als offizielle Antwort zu dem Thema verweise ich auf den Entwicklerkommentar von [b]Fran-GSG[/b] am Ende des Reviews. Vielen Dank für die Stellungnahme und Änderung.

[h1]Fazit:[/h1]
Es gilt generell, wer das Spiel mag und die Entwickler in ihrem Schaffen für weitere oder demselben Produkt supporten möchte, kann weiterspielen wie bisher ohne sich Gedanken um irgendetwas zu machen. Der Schritt zudem so eine Funktion nachzureichen als auch offen darüber zu schreiben, ist auch nicht selbstverständlich.

Wer allerdings etwas auf seine Daten bzw. Traffic aufpasst (aus welchen Gründen auch immer), kann genannten Adressen im Vorraus gezielt blockieren um der Erfassung von Hard/Softwaredaten zu entgehen. Zu realisieren via hosts oder Dns-Einträgen.

Die schlechte Endwertung beziehungsweise negative Kaufempfehlung resultiert daraus, dass einem als Kunde verwehrt bleibt Eigenentscheidungen zu treffen und Daten von Fremdfirmen reguliert werden. Leider lässt Steam es nicht zu Reviews auch als rein Informativ abhaken zu können.
40473701.developer_response:
Thank you for your feedback. First of all, we want to apologize for this. We are only tracking players' behaviour in order to improve everyones experience and make a better game (nothing evil, promised).
However, of course (and that was our mistake) this should be an option. As soon as the new patch comes out, which could happen very very soon, players will be able to decide not to send information just by unchecking a box from the options menu. This is the quickest we could respond to your concerns, but we promise we will introduce even more measures in the future to guarantee that everyone has control over their privacy.

As I said, that fix is going to happen very soon, so I hope that you will be willing to come back to our caves and contribute to our community of dwarf miners. Thanks again for your feedback and enjoy Deep Rock Galactic.

40473392.review:
First up - it's early access, as such content is expected to be not complete and bugs also to be expected.

SO.... to start with having just put 4 hours into the game today, first impressions are pretty positive, didn't encounter any noticable issues with the game, no game breaking glitches, solid netcode throughout, graphics worked perfectly without dropping any frames (Max settings used @ 3440x1440p at 95fps locked).

SO whats the game about??  - Think Borderlands gun play and artstyle mixed with lootrun co-op gameplay sort of Left 4 Dead and mining through destructable random gen cave systems, collecting minerals to complete targets before escaping level while being swarmed with waves of various types of insectoids spit, chewing, exploding to kill you.

You have a robot mule to carry all the loot your team mines which relates to bonus to level up and upgrade kit if you survive to the end when the escape mining dropship returns and the team have to race back to the start zone to escape.

On the largeest since maps I've played it can take 30-60 minutes to do, and in addition the random generation system which so far is very good, should ensure the game has a high replay factor when you crave some run and gun looting gameplay.

The devs have pulled off a very good start as far as I'm concerned, with more content and variation and game modes this could well be the next big thing.

This is the day zero footage I made of the initial solo player mode, shows a small sample of the game for tutorial purposes.

https://youtu.be/Y3RP-1R2q8w

40473385.review:
On my first DRG adventure, my squad and I went in to retrieve 400 units of Morkite. We all knew the risks. We'd heard of entire squads being lost in the deep dark, but the money was too good to turn down. Unfortunately, we foolishly forgotten to recruit a gunner for this foray, and only when we found ourselves at the rim of a 200 meter chasm did we realize the value of the zipline gun. We climbed down slowly, collecting mineral deposits along the way, until reaching the bottom and meeting our quota, and calling in the extraction pod. Then all hell broke loose. The bugs came from every direction a 3D environment could offer, we were swimming in them. our digging specialist died in the first wave, brought down by a volatile exploding bug, and a mini-swarm of spawnlings. We couldn't stop to help him, the timer was already down to three minutes, and the M.U.L.E.  had already boarded. DRG was getting it's money, with or without us at this point. This is where one of our engineers fell. A 100 meter fall should've killed him instantly, but the tenacity of dwarves is an impressive thing. He survived long enough for the bugs to eat him alive. I still hear the screams every time I close my eyes. Fifty meters to the top, our other engineer ran out of ammunition for his platform gun, and exclaimed that we were trapped. the clock read one minute, seventeen seconds to extraction. I turned around and said,"You mean YOU guys are trapped." throwing a final look down at my fallen and trapped comrades, i drew my grappling gun and hoisted myself to the top, the sound of the engineer cursing my name echoing down the hall behind me. with fifteen seconds to spare I alone boarded the extraction pod, and as the doors closed, said my goodbyes, and that I would never forget them. Which is true, I see them every time I sleep. 

10/10 would leave my friends to die again.

As a heavy bearded dwarf you and, hopefully, your team of friends, headed deep down to collect minerals and fight through hordes of bugs!

+ well designed coop gameplay for 4 players
+ 4 different classes with specific abilities and skills
+ awesome horde-style gameplay with random encounters of huge swarms of bugs
+ 4 bioms with completly destroyable environment and awesome atmosphere
+ different ressources and minerals to collect, for upgrading your appearance and gear 
+ smooth graphics with a well designed, minecraft-esque style and awesome light effects
+ rock solid performance
+ very stable, with nearly no bugs and connection errors
+ different beards, head gear and armor to unock & customize your dwarf

- singleplayer offers only half of the fun
- only a few unlocks per class. Give us more beards!

9 out of 10 beards - Awesome coop game with great gameplay, awesome levels and a lot of bearded fun!

40471732.review:
This game is a gem, good controls good mechanics.  Runs fluid online nice smooth gameplay, and can get very challenging.  It definitely gives you that rush feeling when getting back to the drop ship trying to follow Molly when hordes of nasty alien bugs are chasing you down and blocking your path.  There are mellow moments when all is well mining up resources and dropping into Molly's cache, then things can sour real fast if you're not prepared.  The game always keeps you on edge, playing conservatively is key regarding ammo.  You can call in resupply drops though when you have enough Nitra to replenish your ammo. 

Four character classes each with their own unique tools and weapons that play a very beneficial role in completing your objectives.  The procedurally generated levels are gorgeous, and some very challenging.  This game for an early access game feels so good, easily one of the best early access games I have in my library. Some very intense moments, some very funny moments and all around great fun with friends.  You can also play solo and get a helper bot that can mine for you and revive you when you fall.  I would recommend playing with friends or online though, you can progress much faster and have more fun. 

Missions seem to randomally generate as well, you can select the difficulty to go with it.  One nice thing about this is there are four classes, but if someone chooses a specific class it's not locked out, you can all play as the same class if you wanted to. I picked up the supporters upgrade because I want to see this game's developement move smooth and help the devs in any way possible.  Ghost Ship Games are very talented devs, this game is excellent.  Also with supporters upgrade you get a nice set of gold shiny armor for each class along with a badge next to your in game name.  Support these devs!!  They are making a great game!

40471680.review: Can't recommend this game enough. Has so much potential and even at this stage it is incredibly fun!! Going to try to convince my friends to get this one!

40471659.review:
[list]
[*]Runs well
[*]Very fun
[*]Very Tense
[*]Very Atmospheric/Immersive
[*]Multiple difficulties/biomes/procedurally generated caves for unlimited replayability
[*]Can be played Solo or Co-Op (public or private online) - although I would highly recommend co-op, probably the most fun I've had in a co-op game
[*]Very very interactive dev team particularly on Discord
[*]Customisation (more coming later in development)
[*]Progression in the form of equipment upgrades, class levels, and an overall player level
[*]Different gamemodes to change up the experience even more
[/list]

Honestly, if you're considering buying this game, or a friend of yours already has it, just go for it. It's a very small price to pay for one of the most diverse and unique games you can find.

Some may say they don't like the art style or it looks boring or tedious or they can't see the overall objective of the game. To those people I say, don't knock it til you try it. A couple of my friends were against getting the game, but I managed to convince them to give it a go, and oh the amount of fun, stress, frustration, excitement, panic, and relief we've had from playing this game is incredible. 

[b]TL;DR - [/b]Buy it  ->  Try it  ->  Love it / Refund it   
                 [i](Whether you think you'll like it or not, give it a try)[/i]

40470686.review:
Za mě jasně palec nahoru!
Zmixujte L4D s Minecraftem a dostanete tuhle petelici ;)
Je to koperativní hra pro 4 hráče, kde si vyberete jednoho ze 4 trpajzlíků a fáráte drahokamy z podzemí planety
Každá z postav má jinou výbavu, takže je na vás, která třída vám bude lépe vyhovovat, a však vzájemně se dobře doplňují (jeden má uchytný lana, kdy se dostanete výše, další má sentry gun na podporu proti havěti, další například vrtáky, kterým si razíte rychleji cestu šutrákama atd...), takže pokud se připojím do hry a vidím, že borci mají postavu co já, tak si vemu jinou třídu, abych doplnil Team o nějakou schopnost..
Hlavní, co postavy mají společný je drsňácký styl a určitě rádi chlastají :P
Postavy si můžete  postupně upgradovat a i měnit skin
Prostředí je náhodně generovaný a hlavně i  plně destruktiví, takže je na vás, kudy povedete cestu, což je naprosto super a otvírá to další možnosti, jak dokončit kolo
V podzemí vás mimo spoluhráče bude doprovázet robot, nebo spíše chodící kontajner M.U.L.E., kdy ho budete využívat k uskladnění nasbíraného materiálu  a k přivolání modulu k odletu
Dále vás bude doprovázet, (i když možná budete neradi) všelijaká žijicí havěť z podzemí, od pavouků po brouky, který jen tak Biolitem nesundáte
Úkoly jsou různé...seberte to, nebo to, zabijte tamto a vraťte se zpátky na zem...je jen na vás, jak se dlouho zdržíte
Pokud se ztratíte , tak jste pěkně v prd*li a ani skenr okolí vám nepomůže...zabloudíte, spadnete ze srázu  a podzemí se s vámi mazlit nebude...zažil jsem a už jsem jen odříkával otčenáš ;P

Takže to je tak zkráceně asi vše...držte se svého Teamu a uvidíme se na fáračce! ;)

Doporučuji, ač nejsem trpajzlík...10/10

40470227.review:
深岩银河-新人指引V3

基础说明：
1.开始界面可以领取5000金币
2.游戏可以设置为中文
3.进入游戏后会先经历一次教程任务（虽然可以中途退出，但个人推荐先熟悉一下操作）
4.任务完成后会出现在房间内，有用于【选择角色】和【快速加入】的电脑。这两个机器和外面大厅中电脑的功能是重复的。（顺带一提，公共任务是没有密码的，所以遇到有密码的服务器就别闷头点了）
5.进入大厅不下斜坡向左看有一个升降的柱子——这就是电梯。虽然可以上楼，但楼上并没有什么东西（顺带，大厅内没有坠落伤害）
6.同样不下斜坡，门右侧有【启动教程】的教程机器。互动会进入教程关卡。
7.从斜坡下去会有5个互动点。从像地球仪一样的的机器开始分别是【选择任务】，【更改外观】，【臭美商店】，【升级装备】以及此时你视角最左边的【播放机】
8.【选择任务】中有“快速加入”（和房间里面那个功能一样），“服务器列表”和点击地图进入的“任务选择”。“任务选择”有单人或者自己当主机的选项。
9.【更改外观】可以变更已购买的外貌
10.【臭美商店】可以购买外貌（有时候退出时可以卡出还没购买的外貌）
11.【升级装备】可以升级职业装备，不过每个职业的升级都是分开的（此处推荐用领取的金币先升级十字镐和护甲。前者为了避免摔死。后者让你能锤爆臭虫的脑袋……只可惜稿子一次只能锤死一只小臭虫）
12.【播放机】除了能放歌外还能让你跳舞。
13.esc界面中控制面板功能其实按键提示
14.难度影响结算奖励加成，但是别选太难的。虽然“硬核挖矿”也是一种乐趣，但前提是能活着通关。
15.挖矿的坑洞范围是以稿子的准星为原点的球型，因此在挖矿的时候你可以使用一点小技巧……比如用周围挖一次的部分把挖两次的部分打掉。
16.空降仓的距离至少100m，所以别想着提前往回走了。
17.你的血量也算作补给内容。
18.难度加成不仅影响收入也影响材料——如果你觉得这个游戏肝，那么一定是因为你打的太简单了。

矿工主意事项：
1.每种矿石都有挖取上限，但是这个上限是分开的。如果矿满了，此时再挖矿会使矿石掉落。如果矿量比较大可以先按c呼叫矿骡，然后一边挖一边等。
2.单人模式下可以按ctrl命令机器人去挖土，但是多人不行
3.在挖掘过深或者过高的地方可以从旁边绕着挖一圈路上去，但是记得挖掘的时候贴着外侧挖，不然很可能会迷路。（ps：挖掘的时候记得把路拓宽一点）
4.如果找不到路了那就去找找土，如果找不到土那就按m看地图。
5.入口和出口的土一般不在同一层（路痴福音，点赞！）
6.荧光树的果子被攻击之后会发光。
7.长得像荷叶的东西可以把人抬起来
8.如果周围的墙上有些没见过的东西，并且挖掘之后发觉并不只是出现在表面。那么朝最多的地方挖吧！里面会有绝妙珠、玉石、金砖、虫蛋……甚至你寻找许久的土墙（ps，一般情况下靠近目标时会看到亮光，。有时候会两个这种区域重叠在一起）
9.撤离的时候可以跟着矿骡走。如果此时不慎掉队，矿骡会沿路“亲切地”种下指示灯，只是这个路可能不怎么友好。（矿驴有可能从补给的竖坑出去，甚至卡墙。这时候只能手挖了）
10.结算界面只能显示4个人。每个面板下面的4个数字从左到右分别是：击杀数，挖矿数，救援数和死亡数。
11.有时候你会遇到一些发亮到刺（伤）眼（血）的青色晶柱，觉得好看可以留着，不喜欢也可以砸了。

联机提示
1.【快速加入】指定要求随机加入，但如果没有符合要求的地图会询问是否创建。当然你也可以点击右下角的“SERVER LIST”进入服务器界面。
2.主机最后是写有国家区分的（看到cn就表示你可以按住你的“z”键开始和队友愉快的扯皮了）
3.如果单人没有想要的任务地图也可以去组队
4.如果想和队友组队可以进图再通过菜单或者steam页面邀请。
5.这个游戏队友之间有碰撞体积甚至有友伤！请记住你的队友不是肉盾！
6.如果有的矿脉太高了可以踩着队友的头够到，甚至可以通过踩头来避免摔死，但在此之前请保证你的周围都是平地！
7.子弹在人少的时候是非常珍贵的东西，但是人越多的时候子弹反而越便宜。（当人数卡出5个以上后你就可以放心愉快地突突突了。这时候很可能会有人卡到钻探机下面，等等就好）
8.除了esc外，ctrl也能显示队伍信息。并且这还能用激光笔为队友指路。但是这并不能保证让路痴找到路径。此时可以选择先把矿骡呼叫过来，然后跟着你的矿骡走。

除虫注意：
虫子的体型有可以无视的“蠕虫型”，蚂蚁一样大小的“小型”，和你自己差不多大的“中型”，看起来可以骑上去的“大型”，以及看起来像星际的虫族穿越过来的“建筑型”这5种。并且能伤害到你的不仅有虫类，还有一些其他“盆景”。
1.“蠕虫型”都是无害的。普通灰色的蠕虫有的会爆出毒气。橙色发光的蠕虫射击后会爆炸。体型巨大的虫是“保时捷精虫”，打爆有奖。（记得虫子爆炸的时候如果稍微有点距离地贴着可以奖励全吃，不过这个距离需要一点经验“
2.“小型”虫有肉色、绿色两种。前者在地图中随机生成，后者代表附近有一个母巢。
3.“中型”虫有绿色、红色、紫色、亮光橙色这几种类型。绿色为普通虫子，红色会吐酸液，蓝色会吐丝遮盖视野。而橙色明显会自爆。
4.“大型”虫有绿色、红色两种类型，并且全身除了脸和屁股外皆覆盖盔甲。红色的虫叫做“无畏刁虫”……名字屌，本体更屌！蓝红两管血不说蓝血用完的时候还会附送一记“火箭弹”
5.“建筑型”：包括绿色小虫的虫巢”刁虫群落“、瘟疫吐珠和一种会把人吊起来的陷阱虫子。打虫巢的眼睛比打其他地方有效，吐珠吐出来的绿色子弹是可以打爆的；而陷阱虫可以当做smoker（ps：被抓住时请先按x呼救并相信你的队友回来救你。）
6.这些臭虫似乎很讨厌亮光，特别是某些发出强光的晶柱（关闭前照灯还是有点用的……有一点）

教练我想学：
（首先需要说的一点是这游戏的枪其实都挺准的，包括那把机枪。其次是这游戏的手雷是按时间引爆的）
《工程师：托饼昂速成日记》
1.主武器霰弹其实和侦察兵的步枪一样准
2.副武器榴弹会炸到自己，请在血量危险时谨慎使用
3.虽然你可以用枪平台搭出一个桥来，但是请注意：这些“飞饼”是有下坠的
4.安装轻机枪时队友也可以帮你的忙，但是在没有子弹的时候你只能自己按e补充……当然你可以选择拆了重按，但这只会更慢。
5.虽然在任何地方按r都可以回收轻机枪但是它们飞回来也是有时间的。
6.轻机枪似乎有弹药限制，至于为什么是“似乎”……我并不想确认右下角是否真的写了什么令人伤心的数字。
7.轻机枪平台在安装后有时会把周围的土挤开，因此记得别在薄薄的一层上安装这玩意。
8.你的枪平台是没有伤害的，但是他可以救自己和队友，甚至可以让侦察兵挖到一些奇奇怪怪的位置。
9.你的枪平台是不能安在矿骡身上的，这很可惜

《枪手：刺客是怎样炼成的》
1.你的机枪需要预热，不过这个预热所需要的时间其实很短
2.即使你的机枪有数百发子弹，挖起土来也没有你的稿子来得快
3.你的滑索有仰角限制，这在你的准星上可以看到。白色为可布置，蓝色则不行。
4.你的炸药包是手动引爆的。如果想要做骚操作那么很可惜，这玩意丢不远。当然你可以用它炸炸土加快队伍进度
5.知道刺客信条么？挂在你的滑索上然后来回按“e”，这样你就可以像一个刺客一样在虫子的头顶开无双了
6.在坠落的过程中也可以挂上滑索——你确实可以通过你的滑索玩一些极限操作，并且在成功之后庆幸“幸好不是按e脱离”！
7.因为虫子被攻击后有僵直，因此你的机枪可以杵着着那些大虫子的脸打。

《钻机手：喷射器与高危任务》
1.你的钻头是有油量限制的，并且初始只有30的油。这使得你甚至在很多时候不能挖通一条回家的路。
2.虽然你的钻头不是很厉害，但是你有一个厉害的喷火器和一把弹药超多的手枪。
3.你的喷火器是可以无视大型虫子的盔甲的
4.你的喷火器是打小虫的神器，这使得在低等级没啥用的钻机手在高等级任务非常吃香——特别是一个人烧掉虫潮的时候。相信我，你会爱上这种感觉。
5.你的钻头是有伤害的，在队友的屁股朝着你的时候请尤其注意这一点。

《侦察兵：从飞天到断腿》
侦察兵最重要的工具是他的抓勾，会玩的是蜘蛛侠，不会玩的就只能是蜘蛛——被你们打死的那种
1.爬钩挂在天上的时候不能挖掘，但缆绳可以
2.侦察兵抓勾需要持续按住左键，不过由于你可以在中途松手，因此你可以玩些骚操作。但是使用前记得看清目标位置有没有落脚点，因为抓勾有CD！
3.利用抓勾可以避免摔死，因此救人是你的第一要务……如果安全的话
4.抓勾射出有一个短暂的时间，因此如果想要在坠落时自救记得先算好时间
5.如果在路线中间挡住了，那么你就只能卡在那里。如果位置比较尴尬，那么你可以按x呼救并祈祷队友能够得着你……或者让工程师给你甩个飞饼！
6.抓勾飞出的距离是按按住的时候的距离算的，也就是说，如果在射出抓勾的过程中你超过了最大距离依然可以够得到……前提是别松手。
7.在坡度比较大的斜面上你的人物会滑动和小幅度弹跳，这使得侦察兵可以通过在水晶簇等物体之间弹跳来加速移动。这种移动方式对于其他职业来说并不安全
（别想着“抓着矿骡回去”或者“从补给的竖洞回去”之类的骚操作。前者你的抓勾抓不着，后者很可能会导致你又一次摔死）
8.你的手雷是特殊的“磁雷”。虽然没有伤害，但是在被围攻的时候很有用。而且因为手雷按时间引爆，你还可以来个“空中禁区”（ps：如果在逃生的时候你可以往脚下放一枚。我跟你讲，如果玩熟练了——只要有一枚手雷。别说虫潮了，连寂寞都追不上你。当然在这局完了之后很可能你的小伙伴会在现实中追上你然后把你痛揍一顿）

40469478.review: I recommend this game for several reasons. The graphics/art style are beautiful. I get 200+ FPS steady with all settings maxed out (i7 4790k and GTX 1070). The smoothness with which the game runs is amazing. Everything feels responsive and fluid. The sound, music, and voice acting are very good as well. Not only does the game shine aesthetically and technically, the gameplay is also fun and intuitive while requiring meaningful teamwork. The different weapons and gadgets the different classes have complement each other very well. The levels are fascinating to explore, the combat is as difficult as you want it to be, and mining gold (or carving your way through rock walls) with a pickaxe is great fun. All in all, this is the most polished early access game I've ever played. It is the new gold standard for early access, and an innovator in the genre of coop FPS games. Well done GSG, I can't wait to spend many hours playing Deep Rock Galactic.
